description: ICS divisions and groups within an incident command structure, tracking geographic divisions and functional groups with supervisors and tactical objectives.

records.seo_objectives: Primary search and rescue on floors 1-2. Assist with resident evacuation.
Exposure protection on floors 2-3. Ladder operations for ventilation.
Source control and atmospheric monitoring. Level A protection required.
Establish and operate decontamination corridor for personnel exiting hot zone.
